comments: I took this class as an accelerated class through my high school in my senior year, and Jill was definitely an excellent prof. She truly did not grade you on your opinion, but only on how well you supported yourself. I pulled off an 85 in the class, easy. Jill is totally approachable, and so understanding. Her essay prompts are very clear!
Jill is a very fair teacher. There were about 6 essays you had to write whatever is on the final. She gives you what she wants per each paper. Is very picky with grammar.
A new Prof. Was pretty moody. Was willing to help after hours, had a lot of class discussions. She was pretty tough..If you like war literature it is a good class but not the nicest.
